description: The assault on music producer Michel Zecler in Paris was captured in a video that shocked France.
title: Michel Zecler beating: Four French policemen charged over assault
title_page: Michel Zecler beating: Four French policemen charged over assault - BBC News
maintext: At the weekend, prosecutors said the officers had admitted that their violence against Mr Zecler was unjustified but said they acted out of panic after he resisted them in the cramped surroundings of the studio entrance.
